pages.title: Crafting Candle Holders
pages.text: $(br)Decorations needed on your empty tables? Don't worry, $(l)candle holders$() are there to help.$(br2)$(#FF9900)Candle holders$() can light up your table, and fill your room with infinite warmth.

pages.description: It can be lit up using a $(#FF3300)torch$(), $(#FF6600)lantern$() or $(#FF9900)flint and steel$(). Of course, you can also use their $(#55CCFF)soul variants$() for spooky blue flames. If even that is not cool enough, a $(#AA00FF)nether star$() can make it twinkle!

pages.title: Dyeing Candles
pages.text: Simply applying dyes to a candle holder will change the color of candles on it. Thus it is possible to decorate your room with $(#FF0000)c$(#FFAA00)o$(#EEBB00)l$(#BBEE00)o$(#33EEFF)r$(#22AAFF)f$(#8811FF)u$(#EE0000)l$() candles.$(br2)Have a try! ^._.^
